game.name: Trapdoor
game.description:
This time we have brought to you something different that will show you the love and care of a boy for her girlfriend who is far away from him. You are playing as Sean who wants to talk to his girlfriend named Janie. Your love has planned to go to her auntâ€™s house. The girl faces off lots challenges when she is on the way. You continue talking to her and guiding her how to overcome them. Join Trapdoor and be prepared to embark on this wonderful and highly exciting chat story!

Unfortunately, her car broken down on the way and she has no other option rather than walking down the road alone. Oh! Suddenly she spotted a person who is trying to pursue her in the woods. Meanwhile, you need to try to stay connected with her to help her how to deal with that situation. It is amazing to uncover what will happen next in this brand new arcade challenge. She relies on your abilities a lot so do not let her feel down.

This HTML5 innovative messenger-based chat game features simple one-touch gameplay, animated gifts and emoticons and cool graphics. The suspense created during the game will keep you glued to the screen until you finish the entire chat. Good luck to enjoy the matchless fun without download games! Our website features various other top arcade games that are available to play online on multiple devices.
